Posts.Content: Morning Mimi ...I to am having my 3rd treatment this morning ...I haven't slept too good the last two nights ....I had a bit of a bad experience with the nurse last time ..sii think this has made me more anxious this time, I too have had problems with my veins but been reassured it will be ok  ...on the up side we are half way through ...and its count down time after this just think we will be finished with this real soon ...good luck today ...let me know how you are doing ...xxx
Posts.Title: Anxiety about next chemo

Posts.Content: Lucasjack ...that's so reassuring to hear ...I'm waiting for a date for my first cycle ....I feel very down about it all ...trying to live one day at a time and getting on with life but with a dark cloud over my head ...not knowing what to expect....I too am having FEC and trying the cooling cap ...hope your having a good day today lots of love to you x
Posts.Title: * * * SEPTEMBER BREAST CANCER CHEMO CLUB * * *

Posts.Content: Hello Badgerset ...I love your name ...did you go out for a drink after your first treatment ? how did you find it ? I'm still waiting for a date to start mine ...I'm ok but I have moments of darkness now and again ...and panic  ...trying to keep the information going coming to reassure myself .. its my daughters half term coming up in October and we usually go away for a weekend ...but not sure if I'm going to be able to go ..not having a date and then if I'm going to be ok to go ...any info will be greatly received ...I'm also going to be having Fec  hope your feeling well and have a good day xxxx
Posts.Title: * * * SEPTEMBER BREAST CANCER CHEMO CLUB * * *

Posts.Content: Hello I was only told I was having FEC last wed ....Nothing else  ..I have moments  when I think I'll be ok..then moments of complete panick  ...this is preventative treatment so not sure if it's kinder? ..  you sound like your ok .  I think it the not knowing that's scary...I'm scared of being sickly and not taking care of the family...it's our busy time of year and although I have the Days at home    I need to be able to do paper work ..use the phone and clean the house and cook meals ..my husband works long hours .. having said that we are hoping to have treatment day on a Friday so my husband is with me and home sat sun ...so I can at least go out in the car.   It's all unknown at the mo x
Posts.Title: * * * SEPTEMBER BREAST CANCER CHEMO CLUB * * *

Posts.Content: oh no hope your ok ...I cant read your message to me or reply to it ...I'm not being rude and ignoring you  ...I'm not sure I'm using this forum correctly ..I'm useless with the computer ....take care my lovely xxx
Posts.Title: * * * SEPTEMBER BREAST CANCER CHEMO CLUB * * *

Posts.Content: well done your halfway there ....keep going ..stay strong xxx
Posts.Title: * * * SEPTEMBER BREAST CANCER CHEMO CLUB * * *

Posts.Content: Just wondering if anyone is awake..sleep depravation again ....x
Posts.Title: cant sleep again

Posts.Content: Hello Nikki ...I'm waiting for a date to start Fec ...how are you finding it ? are you able to live your life as normal as usual? ///   I'm petrified to be honest ...any tips would be greatly received x
Posts.Title: * * * SEPTEMBER BREAST CANCER CHEMO CLUB * * *

Posts.Content: PS ...where did  you get the fringe from ////I have a heavy fringe so would like to see if if I can replace that with a hat ...hopefully if I can do that and its winter ...no one will notice ...I haven't told many people where I live ....be good if I can keep it that way xxx  lots of love xxx
Posts.Title: * * * SEPTEMBER BREAST CANCER CHEMO CLUB * * *

Posts.Content: Hello How are you doing ? I'm still waiting ..its bloody awful ...I'm anxious about everything ....its my daughters half term in oct ...I'm wondering if we are going to be able to get away for a weekend /// I'm trying the cold cap ...and I'm off to the wig shop today with my hairdresser ...I went to the mustard tree last Friday for support and the lady said to me ..not to bother using the cold cap ..ill lose my hair anyway on fec ..but if I'm going to try I need to cut my hair very short ...ive already had 4 inches of the bottom ...its now up to my shoulders but its very very thick ...I'm ok most of the time but I have some dark moments and I panic , so keeping busy ...my house has never been so clean ...I'm just so tragic x
Posts.Title: * * * SEPTEMBER BREAST CANCER CHEMO CLUB * * *

Posts.Content: Hello Lucasjack .  I hope your ok ...I start my first cycle on Thursday ....to say I'm petrified is an understatement ...I feel like I'm going to change ..and this is going to change my life dramatically ...I'm very down about the whole thing and I'm never going to leave the house again .....I hope this isn't the case .....I'm having FEC .is that what your on ? ..hope you don't mind me asking ...lots of love Jane x
Posts.Title: * * * SEPTEMBER BREAST CANCER CHEMO CLUB * * *

Posts.Content: Hi Lucasjack ...is that your first cycle? ...how are you finding it ?...I have my first one Thursday x
Posts.Title: * * * SEPTEMBER BREAST CANCER CHEMO CLUB * * *

Posts.Content: Oh...I wasn't told about the 7 injections and the steroids ...it all sounds complicated ..the hospital is quiet a way from us ...its a 45 min bus ride ....and I don't drive ..I'm having the paxman cold cap ...so my visit will be longer ..no I'm just having FEC,,,i have a blood test booked in at my doctors for wed morning ..I'm not sleeping to good at the mo anyway ....I get to sleep ok as I am tired but wake up far too early ...glad your ok ...chocolate fudge cake sounds lovely ..up to last week  I was doing slimming world I'm a target member ...at 4 and half stone  ...but my eating habits are strange due to stress and ive lost a bit of weight that I need to put back on ...thanks for your advise ...I guess we are all very different with diagnosis and treatments ....hope you have a lovely weekend xxx
Posts.Title: * * * SEPTEMBER BREAST CANCER CHEMO CLUB * * *

Posts.Content: Hiya ...yes its Thursday ....I'm absolutely dreading it ..I feel like a lamb to the slaughter   how stupid is that ?? I do feel stupid as I know it will be fine ...the drs wouldn't let us suffer or even home if it was terrible ... but this is how I feel despite talking to loads whom have been through it and reading up on here ....please keep in touch ...its nice to know someone is there with me ,,,although I wouldn't wish this on anyone ..but you know what I mean ....are you trying the cold cap? I am ...I have very thick hair ..so hopefully I get to keep some of it ...but have a wig on stand by ...I have bought lemon ginger tea ...a digital thermometer .tablets for a squiffy tummy ..soft toothbrush and mouth wash ....so hopefully this will be sufficient ...again I feel drowned by information and tips and not liking the amount of appointments I'm having to keep ....but this is going to life the 4 months ...with Halloween bonfire night two birthdays and Christmas in between I'm not sure how this will pan out ...hey ho ...one step at a time xxx
Posts.Title: * * * SEPTEMBER BREAST CANCER CHEMO CLUB * * *

Posts.Content: Morning I nodded off ...on the sofa ....I got the awake thread but cant post on there ...?? I'm not very techno minded I'm afraid x
Posts.Title: cant sleep again

Posts.Content: Hello ...I was only told I'm having FEC on wed ..I'm finding it hard to stay asleep at the mo ...I'm not sure when I'm going to have my first cycle ...I'm just trying to get prepared ...keep in touch ..lots of love x
Posts.Title: * * * SEPTEMBER BREAST CANCER CHEMO CLUB * * *

Posts.Content: Hello ...still haven't heard anything ..been a week now since I was told ...ive booked a flu jab ...not dentist ...hate dentist ...do I need too? ..haven't been for years ..ive spoken to a couple of ladies whom have had the same treatment as me ...do you get steroids if they haven't mentioned them ? ...ive been told its fec ...and a clear up ..like a mop up so its not so intense ...??? x
Posts.Title: * * * SEPTEMBER BREAST CANCER CHEMO CLUB * * *

Posts.Content: yes I'm starting to get stuff in ...I bought a wig ...and I like I it ...although the wig lady from the hospital ..said if I'm using the paxman I might not need it ..she felt my hair and its super thick ...I bought ginger lemon tea ...wasn't sure which mouth wash to get ...and intend to get a oft toothbrush ....ill get Imodium ..I was thinking ...I had terrible morning sickness when I was carrying my daughter ...it was all day and night and could only drink fizzy water and eat sausages and mixed curry ...I had to carry a bowl everywhere with me ...and used it even in the car ..ive also had very bad anaemia  ..when I would fall asleep in the afternoon ...all the time ..in fact I was quite dangerously ill .....I don't spose it could be as bad as that?  and at least this time I can take something for it x I'm up early but its 4.30 and not 2.30 ....but I'm still getting 7 hours sleep which is good for me anyway ...xxx     take care and thank you for keeping in touch ....hope you have a good day today xxx
Posts.Title: * * * SEPTEMBER BREAST CANCER CHEMO CLUB * * *

Posts.Content: Hello yes ive had my date ..pre chemo apt wed next week start cycle on Thursday 9 am ....hence why I'm up so early ...I cant sleep again ....this is getting to me now the sleep thing ...I'm so nervous .and upset ...I feel myself going into panick mode ...I'm not sure I'm using  this forum correctly I cant find my messages ...the positive ones have helped me through ....is there a thread that you can talk to people at night time? ....hope this message finds you well ...lot of love xxx
Posts.Title: * * * SEPTEMBER BREAST CANCER CHEMO CLUB * * *

Posts.Content: Hiya ...yes I'm wondering how it would feel ...how many have you had ? I don't want to be useless or out of control ...I'm not use to being sickly ...its our busy time for work at the mo and need to be able to function ....how are you ?? xxxx
Posts.Title: * * * SEPTEMBER BREAST CANCER CHEMO CLUB * * *

Posts.Content: I do SW and that's how I found the lump ...I lost 4 and half stone ...going to try and keep to it the best I can through this ...but the last few weeks I lost a bit extra due to stress ...my tummy has been churning with nerves so eating what I fancy at the mo ...I'm hoping once Thursday is done ill be able to accommodate some discipline ..I want to try and keep to my routine ...I work from home ..and as this is our busy season ill need to function ...although I can rest when I need ...its just the house work and cooking I worry about ...my husband is lovely and keen ...but useless at cooking and house chores ...have you been out? how did you feel going out on your own ? x
Posts.Title: * * * SEPTEMBER BREAST CANCER CHEMO CLUB * * *
